## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withResponse() method

Define a component response.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withResponse(name: string, response: ResponseObject | ReferenceObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | The name of the response |
|  response | <code>ResponseObject &#124; ReferenceObject</code> | Specification of the response |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
